title: Analysis of Changes in Mathematics Learning Motivation and Simulated Teacher Support Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of secondary mathematics and fundamental proficiency in VR/simulation tools
context.additional_context: Learners experience various teacher-support scenarios in a VR environment and track/analyze motivational changes.

learning_goals: Students can identify changes in math learning motivation profiles using latent transition analysis with over 85% accuracy
Students can quantify the impact of teacher support types (autonomy, learning, lesson design, error management) on motivation changes in simulation environments
Students can design personalized motivation profile transition prediction models using VR-based analysis tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
